mapper.select: SELECT p1.*, c.category_name FROM (SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_name, p.phone_number, p.pro_img, p.emp_cnt,u.email, u.user_cash, p.pro_star_rate, l.region, l.city, cl.category_id FROM tbl_pro p JOIN tbl_location l ON p.location_id = l.location_id JOIN tbl_category_list cl ON p.pro_id = cl.pro_id JOIN tbl_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ) p1 JOIN tbl_category c ON p1.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p1.pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_pro where pro_id=#{proId} and pro_name = #{proName}
